mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (RNO, RTITLE, RCONTENT, RPOINT, RPOTO, RDEPTH, REPORTCOUNT, RWRITER_DATE, RAPPOINTMENT, CNO, DSAUP_NO) VALUES (REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, '', 0, 0, SYSDATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPOINTMENT WHERE CNO='3' AND DSAUP_NO='11111111111'), 1, 11111111111)
